description: A Bryant woman was arrested Thursday morning in the December death of her 4-year-old son, police say.
title: Bryant mother charged in 4-year-old's death
text:
A Bryant woman was arrested Thursday morning in the December death of her 4-year-old son, police say.
About 6:30 a.m., Tabatha Bohac turned herself in to the Saline County jail after an arrest warrant was issued on a manslaughter charge earlier this week, Bryant Police Department spokesman Sgt. Todd Crowson said.
On Dec. 16, 2014, Bohac called 911 after her son was found unresponsive in her home, he said. The boy died that day.
Crowson said an autopsy of the boy led to Bohacâ€™s arrest.
Bohac is being charged with manslaughter and is being held in the Saline County jail in lieu of $35,000 bond, Crowson said.
